Blog.post: yeah so im down here in the middle of nowhere, USA and its BORING!! i hate it down here..only pluses are i like spendin time with my g-parents cuz they cool..i also liked goin down to mexico today..got some cool stuf and guy my boy a necklace..cuz i didnt think hed want a ring like me..or maybe he does who knows...haha yeah i got a really cute belt and i also LOVE goin fishin with my parents and my grandpa which we are doin tomms! i cant wait! now normally ppl dont see me as the fishin type but i love it..im gonna catch the biggest fish out there toms u just wait and if ur lucky ill bring it home and fry it up for u..man im not gonna be able to see sam much this summer...this week we're in town monday through thurs but hes got stuff goin on this week so idk...i get to see kenny chesney this weekend with katherine! we leave on sat im psyched!! normally i dont like cournty music but man im stoked! yall have no idea...i cant wait to be bak home tho..only one more day here (i get back on monday) and then i can see all u guys and maybe hang out at the pool if i get rid of this awful sunburn! i just sit here and write letters to sam and listen to music..thats basically how my days are filled...well im gonna go do some more of that, sams gona have a book by the time i get home...catch yall cats lata!

yeah so last night was soo fun! we went out to eat after school with sam david kate nick mere kath and lauren...then sam kath and i came over to my place and watched legally blonde...after katherine left it got kinda hot and heavy...haha allee...then we put in titanic and yeah and allee came over..and she kept commenting to the movie although it couldnt hear her and it was the funniest thing ever! i love taht girl to death! yeah so im leavin toms for down south and the city isnt even on the map! how sad is that! but its ok i get to go sea fishin and to mexico to go shoppin! yay! i love fishing and usually ppl dont think that about me but its ok cuz i love it...omg it doesnt feel like summer! im gona miss all the seniors although i really didnt get to know many except taylor who im really gonna miss..oh well thats how life goes ya kno...yeah so last night we went bowling too..it was soo much fun even tho im not that good....i got 4th and 3rd..we need to do that more often..yeah well i think im gona go make oatmeal cookies! no ones home! hopefully i get to see one of my friends tonight before i leave...i really dont wanna go..it feels like im leavin forever even if its only a few days...i love u guys and ill catch yall cats lata!

srry thats the title of my fave song..well actually the title is only one but ya kno..if u know yellowcard, you'll get it, and if u dont ur a loser...yeah so i got kicked out of the car pool today..kate got stuck with the reject...and we watched club dread...worst movie ever..i'll spare u the details..dont ever let kate pick out movies...silent night deadly night...enough sayd haha but none of yall get that.oh well...yeah i downloaded like 20 yellowcard songs last night..some of their old ones, avondale is a really good one..and underdog and big apple heartbreak to name a few...i'm watchin that 70's show...its cute eric's gonna ask donna to marry him! how cute...but stupid! hes like we're happy and hyde goes "u dont get married when ur happy, u get married when ur backed up against a wall and have no other way out" haha great line...haha kitty wants eric to be a pharmacist..lol haha i swear shes high as a kite...ahah there was a line in club dread that was like bogo the crab was as high as a kite until he fell down and broke his shell haha i tought it was funny.....lol kelsos such an idiot...man ive got the munchies...im kinda hungry..hha he thinks the dog looks like fez...lol the dogs high!!!!! haha reds like that dogs gotta go! and bobs like i think he just went (like pee in reds chair) ahhaha it was realy funny...well i gotta go i'll catch yall cats lata!

two more days left guys!! can u believe it?! yeah wow i cant wait for summer its gona so totally rock squirt! lol ok so whos havin a party?? plz someones gotta have a great party...yeah so i dont have much to write about cuz my days are purtty boring...yeah yankees won last night thats right!! but they're 1 1/2 games behind red sox so hopefully we can pull it up but i mean we're still goin to playoffs since we're second...we're not havin too good of a season..oh well we'll get em next year boys...anyways my life is great...things are goin well with sam...yeah u can leave me a post and tell me how yals relationships are goin..yeha so im gonna force sam to watch legally blonde with me on wednesday...we watched like 10 mins of it already...he likes it...he just wont admit it haha oh well he can deal with pink for 2 hours...wait 4..we're watchin the sequel too...haha watch jeepers creepers tonight yall its on at 7 on ch 66!! its a good movie..kinda creepy, but great...so its my last day of serious finals toms! cuz weds i only have photography and band...i can stare at max for two hours...the last time for the year..so sad..but its ok cuz he made me this necklace so ill always remember him! rock on!! yeah sam told me about his adventures on a certain bus ride last year...but we wont go there... but im lokin for some girl named...i forgot but if u find her....tie her down so i can kill her!!! haha just kidding! dude my arms gone like un controllable so its kinda hard to type with my left one so if theres a random lik eaoreartaewta eaewt awetaewtawetertadgfasdf somewhere just ignore it....haha so how was yalls LAST MONDAY?! wow im gonna miss bein a fish...cuz my big sis hated me and didnt take me anywhere so an upperclassmen should adopt me as a lil sis and take me places haha.'..well i gotta go to piano..fun right? yeah i kno..well i'll catch yall cats lata!

yeah so today is saturday..srry i left yall guys last night..i was with sam! wink wink...but u'll never know anything that happened cuz i dont kiss and tell...whoops haha yeah so i was at counselor training today...me and allee woke up WAY too early for like safety...YAY yankees jsu made a double play and shut the rangers out of the inning...they lost to them last night hopefully we wont do it again...but rangers are a good team so its all good...so if rangers make it to the world series and we dont..ill support them...yeha im now CPR and first aid certified...arent u proud of me? yeah well it was like 6 freakin ours long and it sucked well i gota go watch the game and take a shower...catch yall cats lata

actuallly it wasnt too terrific...first i hit my head on my uncles car...it still hurts..yeah so not much happened today...it was our last full day of schoolyay!!!!! yeah so i started talkin to an old friend and sam wasnt too comfortable with me seein him again but its ok cuz i had to stay home anyway and do my stupid bio notebook so i dont get a c....hopefully i can pass all my calsses with a b!! man NEVER slack off jus cuz its the last 6 wks and think u can make it all up in the last two weeks.....it doesnt work so stay on top of ur stuff so u can party it up! i have to do my bio review tonight..fun im not really nervous about finals..cuz they dont go on ym average so its all good...man u kno im addicted to shows w/ ppl gettin killed like CSI or without a trace or law and order..they're all good..yeah im wathcin CSI with allee at the moment...ahh i like sam so much!! i'm so happy that i have him and its lookin soooo good..srry i had to say it..its a week today!! yay! well i'm gonna go i'll catch yall cats lata!

yeah so today was wednesday..i can spell it!! tomms is a week for me and sam! yay! i'm excited!! it was sooo sweet we were comin home from hard rock and we dropped him off and he like came over to my side of the car and opened the door and was like "i want a goodbye hug" AWW i was like ur the best EVER!yeah so yanks are in 2nd place right now but its ok....i'll live..i hope...today was kats bday yay! the big one five! kath if u read this do u wanna go to my bros game tommms night? i think that was 1 too many m's but oh well...yeah so i've been great lately...last night i got a text from jordon de la cruz who i havent talked to since like idk winter break maybe? yeah but i was glad to hear from him...its been a while since ive talked to my ahs friends... but i get to see them at kaths party this weekend! if u weren't invited and want to come give me a call...cuz we'd love u have u, blazer lazer tag here we come!! yippee!!!!! yeah i want a goldfish...id name him herman...herman the pet goldfish...or maybe herman the frog....or herman the idk alligator...but not herman the dog cuz herman just isnt a good name for a dog...so for my birthday, PLEASE PLEASE PLEASE get me a goldfish named herman...thats all i want...or a miniature horse named killer...but that costs jus a little tiny bit more than a goldfish..but i mean if u wanna get me a miniature horse be my guest..it can stay in my room and sleep on the floor and be housetrained!! or u could get me a rotweiler named cuddles or a python named fluffy...all great pets with great names....what about like a bull named giggles....WOW that'd be awesome!!! well i'll leave yall to go buy me my gifts...i'll catch yall cats lata!

yeah so today was the big algebra test...it went GREAT!!! today was a beautiful day!! everythings great...sams awesome...srry steph i kno i put a lot about him in here but hey im on like cloud 2094307429384 at the moment..everythigns great...not failing any classes...man life is good dont u think? but yanks are prolly gonna lose tonight and red sox r gonna win cuz they're playin the worst team in the east and we're playin teh best team in the west so we'll see how that goes...yeah well i dont have much to say except today was GREAT and i couldnt be happier right now..except at lunch when laurisa like yelled out "shes goin out with sam!" which was great except i kinda told adrew i wanted to finish the year single which was ture at the time...but yea u know how that goes...and he was like RIGHT there and iw as liek CRAP cuz u kno hes a good freind of mine and i was jus like great hes gonna be mad..but idk he doesnt seem like that kinda person to me...hopefully hes not...well i'm gona go watch that 70s show i LOVE YALL!! catch yall cats lata!

yeah so i dont have much time but all in all today was purty good...no more homework, just catching up on ll the things i didnt do...yeah ive slacked off which was a BAD idea...dont do it!!! sam and i are doin great...in case anybody cares haah which yall dont but oh well..yanks and red sox are still 1 and 2 and niehtr has a game today..yeah well not much happened...catch yal cats lata..gotta make a cake for spanish and study for a n algebra test

ok so todays sunday...this mornin i didnt really wanna wake up cuz i mean come on its 8:15 on sunday mornin...but im glad i did cuz it was a good church service, and yall who know me know i love my church and we ahd this guest quartet singing and their last song just brought me to tears...it was called "its always been the soldier" and they recognized all the vets, widows, parents of military, current ppl in the millitary, and police officers (which is my daddy)and i was just bawling...but it was really sweet... and then i had my piano recital which was ok i guess...and now im home jus hangin out.. got a pencil through the bun in my hair and im jus bein lazy...but all in all today was a good day,its gorgeous outside, yall should at least look out ur windows and pretend to bask in the sunlight..also today daddy took me shoppin for random beauty stuff..ended up spendin an ungodly amount but hey thats the price u pay for lookin good am i wrong? of course not...but hes gonna be gone for like a week so thats why he did it..but i got a lot of realy cool stuff..i cant wait for tomms so i can see my sweeti! hes so sweet i swear...i already have my wedding china picked out...haha just kidding..but i do have my wedding china picked out...ive had my eye on it for a couple of years now..its the nice white plates with the gold rims on teh outside (if u want an example go watch pretty woman, its in the scene where he's teaching her which fork to start with and stuff) well i'm gonna go get in comfy clothes...ill catch yall cats lata..

Yeah so I'm grounded this weekend for not turning in algebra homeworks, oh well...i'll live, plus i got some MUCH NEEDED spring cleaning in,i actually have a floor! can u believe it! i'm so excited! yeah so the yankees lost today, it was horrible we were tied with seattle through the top of the 13th inning, and thats when we screwed up...ok so we intentionally walked two batters to load the bases so that there would be a force out at all of them...normally this is a good idea, but probably not when ur playin for game points...so seattle ended up going through their entire lineup and almost doubling their score in just ONE INNING...however, derek jeter did get on base! but then williams struck out swinging..and thats how the game went...but on a better note, the ballet was absolutely beautiful last night and i loved it! I cant wait to marry some rich guy that can donate a lot to the ballet so we can get great seats! yeah when i get older and guys learn to appreciate ballet, thats where they need to take me...hint hint(tell sam) haha actually i already told him he had to take me sometime...ah, hes the best ever..i really hope i dont kill this one, haha yeah i'm watchin law & order SVU...i love this show! its amazing...i cant wait to be a lawyer..since i like kids so much i was thinkin about goin into child law like divorce placement cases and stuff like that, the episode im watchin now is about a boy that was murdered and he was and illegal alien from Africa and bought by this guy who used him as a sex slave while his wife was gone..gross right? but yall should really watch the show, its good... yeah well i don't have much more to say.. i get to go to the mall with allee! so im not TOO grounded but i mean honestly ur either grounded or ur not its not like well ur only grouded a little bit..kinda weird if u ask me.. but yeah im goin shoppin for skirts..yeah this week is katherines bday yall so dont forget to get her somethin on wednesday..yeah thats right i learned how to spell it! haha well i'll catch yall cats lata

hey guys! yay its friday! i don't have much time cuz i have to be walking out the door for cinderella in like 30 mins..but i can tell yall that i have the best boyfriend EVER! hes so sweet w/o being like suffocating..he sent me a text today and it was like "i just felt like sayin luv ya" AWWWWWWWW! i was like I LOVE U SAM!! it was great and i felt loved...YANKEES ARE IN 1ST!!!!!!!! lets all celebrate...only not this weekend cuz im grounded..however i got an 82 on my algebra test! YEAH!! i'm listnin to michael jackson in 'Thriller'..shut up yall know u all have embarassing songs that u like too...hey MJ was good in the black days.. i dont get to see sam this weekend...(frown) but its ok..we'll go out next weekend or somethin...i have to make a cake for spanish on monday...im puttin it in here so i wont forget...well im gona go get all prettiful for the ballet!!!

HE ASKED ME!! yay! so i guess i DO deserve a bf don't i ashley? or at least he thinks so...yeah so i'm in a great mood..except that my allergies are KILLING ME! they suck hard core..haha yeah so i don't have too long to write cuz i have to go to band, fun right? yeha i know u wish u were there...or not... yeah so i had my big algebra test today, i think it went well (cross ur fingers for me) and if i do good i can go to cinderella at the ballet! but by mom will prolly let me go regardless of my grade cuz we all know cinderella is like THE BEST EVER! yanks lost last night... 11-2 honestly that SUCKS but so did boston so we're stil 1/2 a game behind...which is ok cuz if we can stay in 2nd we cna go to the playoffs, hopefully jeter will wakeup....maybe he just needs to see me and he'll be like OMG I need to play gooder! haha yeah so I'm grounded this weekend cuz i have missing hw in algebra, among other classes, but its ok...unfortunately i dont get to see my NEW BOYFRIEND! but its ok...nothings really changed between us since we started goin out but i think its for teh best just to take it slow for now...yeah this summer is gonna be bomb! kath i cant wait for july! alska here we come!!also me allee and kath will be volunteerin at a summer camp with kids so we'll be able to go lay out but the pool and get our tan on when we get off! yeah so i really need to do my nails cuz they look bad....ok well i gotta run! actualy drive, anyway we're goin to band....yip! catch yall cats lata...I'm not single!

he ALMOST did it! he was supposed to but apparently he "never had the opportunity" ugh! hes supposed to do it tomorrow however..yeah i learned how to spell it! so how are yall? SOMEONE plz leave a comment so i can be liek IM SO COOL PPL ACTUALLY READ ABOUT ME!! haha...oh yeah yanks won! pop the bubbly! however, so did red sox, so we're still half a game behind..turn on ESPN2 tonight at like 10 and u can see my boys play! yeah go jeter! although right now im dependin on my boy a-rod cuz jeter's in what some ppl like to call a slump..oh well everyone has those 0-for 100000000 seasons right? oh well.. its ok..yeah im depending on josh to keep that promise that if yanks go to the series we're watchin the games together! altho they prolly wont and ill be all alone but thats cool to cuz i'll jsut pretend derek is right there next to me goin "ur sooo hott erica plz marry me, cuz u know number 4 isnt comin through for ya..." but its cool i think i'll stick with this one for a while, hes a great guy..only problem is that i liked another guy but eventually decided i didn't like him enough to go out with him and i got tired of waiting...but i told him i wanted to finish the year single WHICH WAS TRUE!..at the time...but not now...well gotta go to tutorin so i dont fail my test tomms catch yall cats lata! LATER...... yeah so its like 8 now and i came back and i had a comment!!! unfortunately its about how im a bitch and ppl talk shit about me...however, tahts ok with me because I have a guy taht i like and that likes me and its all taht matters...so anyway i jsut got back from my tutoring and i feel SO much better about my test tomms! yay! and I'm about to go running b/c my mom wants me to excercise...well gotta run (haha get it? I'm amused) ill catch yall cats lata

ok so I know i should be in school right now, but i came home to get caught up on ALL my schoolwork b/c according to my mom...i socialze too much. but really can u socialize TOO much? i dont think its possible, but i gotta find that healthy balance of school-band-piano-social-boys...ugh its gonna be hard.. so he didnt ask me out yet...he told me its no fun if i know exactly when hes gonna do it which i think is stupid cuz he sayd he was gonna do it this week...guys, cant live with em and can't live without em...yeah if u agree let me know (just click the write comment button-cuz i like to feel loved and i feel loved when ppl write comments) yeah so I'm feelin kinda left out here cuz almost all my friends have bf's..but if u dont its ok cuz honestly i enjoy the single life much more because I'm what some ppl choose to call a flirt...but i mean as fun as that singleness is when u find a guy u really like, ur willin to give it up...for a while haha..yeah so John called me shallow today which in all honesty I think is rather rude if u ask me..i dont think he had a right to say that because in my opinion im not shallow...lauren is..and if ur not in our lunch group u wont get the lauren comment..dont worry..so yanks are only 1/2 a game behind right now, don't ask how its possible cuz i dont understand all i kno is they play tonight and if we win, and red sox lose...we'll be tied again for first in the division..yeah im a baseball freak i know but honestly guys in tight pants runnin around...u cant go wrong..I'd just like to remind all of u that my birthday is in two months and 20 days (august 1 for those of u who cant count) and my favorite flowers are stargazer lillies...yeah thats about all for today..i should be getting back to my homework..GO YANKS!! P.S. I made my mom dinner for mothers day last night..it was good, we had chicken and peach cobbler, stupid thing took me 3 hours...so if u ever want me to make dinner for u some weekend let me know and ill do it!! haha catch yall cats lata

ok so today i was in a good mood right cuz #4 was supposed to ask me out this week (if u dont know who number 4 is, then u dont deserve to)...so yeah i've learned im really impatient...and im listnin to some really random song josh told me to download, its called Capital H by Motion City Soundtrack...idk i cant understand these things. so anyway number 4 has been "waiting to see if its real between us" for a while now cuz apparently im relationship ADD and cant stay on one guy too long..well i mean honestly ppl u gotta fish the ocean if ya kno what i mean...but i think im gonna stick on this one for a while, hes a good guy... ok so off of the guy subject...so in baseball today redsox are leading their division and yanks are in 2nd only 1 game behind...Jeter i swear...someone needs to knock some sense into that boy...maybe if he dates me he'll have some motivation, what do u think? haha yeah im totally fascinated by this whole online diary thing if u cant tell...i love having the world care about me! or at least be bored enough to actually resort to reading about my day! ok another random song by MCS, its called 'The future freaks me out' idk its about some chick named betty....dude i really want cookies..choco chip...mmmmm...yeah so apparently my mom thinks im fat cuz she stole the chocolate chips and hid them somewhere...ROCKIN! i just got out of my piano lesson haha i dont have to go today! yeah im really random..its proly a good thing #4 doesnt have the internet or else he'd be reading about my love for him...or deep like...ok well i've prolly wasted enough of yalls time for today...hope he does it tommorow!...btw idk how to spell tomorrow, tommorow, tommorrow, tommorrow? ok well i'll catch yall cats lata! P.S. i have a piano recital sunday COME AND SEE ME!! just kidding plz dont its embarassing..

so i was away at church camp this week and it was AWESOME!! i couldnt believe it! i got to know my roommates soooooo well! and jess and i became really good friends and it was really uplifting and changing...in our room we covered so many contraversial issues such as eating disorders and stuff and we found a verse taht sayd the king is enthralled by your beauty, which explains the title..i thought it was really a great verse so i thought id share...yeah yanks are still on top of the charts...im watchin law and order SVU, its the best show ever but its really sad..well im gonna go so ill catch yall cats lata

yeah so today i went to my dads baseball game and he wouldnt stop talkin to ppl afterwards i was like OMG im hungry!! my bro hit his first homerun in mustang today so im proud...i think...haha allee and i r gona see stepford wives today man im bored! i dont really wanan go to wild week next week but im kinda excited cuz i get to chill with amanda and lauren c and jess...i felt so bad the other night, i told sam id call him back and TOTALLY forgot! i was like uh....i got home late haha yeah so its been like a month, im proud of myself haha "im feelin like stupid riding a pony trying to chase some guy down.." haha only hali would get taht unless catherine katherine or natalie were listnin to my pointless rambling...someone needs to have a party and by someone i mean anyone but me (katherine)...haha man i feel fat right now i just ate pudding...i took it out of the fridge and my dads liek whats taht and i was like well some people call this meal lunch...herman is doing good...i cleaned his bowl yesterday and then like cloroxed my whole bathroom...so its all clean and i cleaned up my room really good like...haha save a horse......RIDE A COWBOY!!! srry im listnin to that song...ok well yanks are tied with the padres in the top of the 12th im gonna get back to my game...catch yall cats lata! (and we're STILL beating the red sox!!)

actually im great those are just lyrics to one of my new fave songs..if u ever stop lovin me by montgomery gentry..so hwats up with yall? not much here..jsut had the best two hours of my life yesterday with sam....and thats all im gonna say haha well my first day of work yesterday was good too...theres a really cute guy that works there his names jerry haha....hermans doin good...man our a/c is out again...and i left my phone charger in dallas...and lost the other one...my dads not happy...haha me and cait are watchin mad tv..good times good times...ok well without all the drama of school theres really not much to write..itll be 4 weeks for me and sam this thursday!yay! well i'll catch yall cats lata!

that cowboy just might be kenny chesney! haha we went to the concert this weekend....best concert ever, became better friends w/ ppl and just had an all around amazing time! its the perfect ending to my summer...i say that cuz im gona be workin all summer...well not everyday so its not that bad i guess..yeah herman is doin good..i think..i havent checked on him since i got home...hold on..yupp hes good everythings good right now...sox are still behind yanks 2 1/2 games...but we lost to texas 1-8 last night..oh well...omg i got the colest shirt! it has a pic of a vaccum and its like this sux and a pic of a dog that says this bites and a pic of a fan that says this blows and on teh back it has a hott pic of kenny sayin this rocks...its great i love it and i dont care what yall say! haha well im gonna go...catch yall cats lata!

oh summers great isnt it? just hangin with friends stayin out till all hours of the night...good times...last night allee and i went to my aunts to go riding...i forgot how much i missed my pony! today im goin to the lake! i cant wait to get on those water skis again! and tomms i leave for arlington for the big K to the ENNY concert...i still wish it was yellowcard..but ill take any way i can to get away from my family haha allees like passed out on my couch right now...OMG u remember how i sayd i wanted a fish named herman? well i got one!! yall all have to come over and meet him...hes a blue beta with green rocks in his fishbowl and an orange plant so it all clashes but hes so pretty u dont notice...now i have someone to talk to in my room! i wanted a bird initially cuz it could talk back but hermans great..he doesnt interrupt like a bird would...he just listens and blows bubbles...haha life is great isnt it? omg allee kept me up last night playing the rhyming insult game...it was like ur fat, you look like a rat, you have an ugly cat...until i shut her up with "you're ugly" and she couldnt rhyme anything with it...haha i was like yay sleep! we watched league of extraordinary gentlemen...great movie! yankees are on top!! ahead by 2 1/2 games! wow thats a pretty big lead...hope we can hang onto it..we play texas the mext three days and tx has a good team this year man..so if they beat us i wont be too upset...well im gonna go feed herman...yall all need to come over and see him! i'll catch yall cats lata! ....LATER..... okay so the boat didnt work today but thats ok...we'll do it another time i still had fun bein a mermaid lol and almost gettin eaten (sp?) by killer fish...speaking of fish...herman is awesome i love that lil guy..yeah so about that babysitting job the other night...it was HORRIBLE!!!!!! allee and i got 20 bucks..not each...all together for 4 1/2 hours of babysitting devil children..i was on the phone with sam for like 10 mins and the lil girl told her mom it was two hours...but iw as like good maybe she wont call me back...anyway yeah the lil girl was like have u and ur boyfriend done it yet? and i was liek OMG shes only 10! i was like thats for after marriage and shes like no its not i was like OOO MMMM GGGG!! i think hermans depressed...he wont eat...maybe he doesnt like the food...well im gonna make a quick run to khols to see if i can get new shorts like the ones my dogs ruined!! catch yall cats lata

today is not a good day...today is a horrible terrible no good very bad day! (quote from the d to the r seuss..) yeah i woke up and my room is in a shambles cuz my dogs screwed everything up and they tore up my brand new shorts!ugh! and UGH!! yeah me and allee went over to sams last night...his moms really nice i didnt get to talk to his dad much tho...oh it feels so good to be home! tonight i was suposed to see sam over here but some lady called and wanted me to babysitt so i sayd yes but im trying to get ahold of katherine but she wont pick up her phone...i think davids answerin it and that upsets me very much...im really not havin a good day...if allee wasnt here idk what id do...ugh id be like outta control yeah ok well i'll catch yall cats lata!

have you ever noticed how people can be so mean? and not just to you i mean havent u ever caught urself and sayd wow im such a jerk? and how its so hard not to hold grudges...i mean u know its wrong but somehow its just so hard to forgive and forget? and how you would just love to press the rewind button of life sometimes? but i think theres no rewind button for a reason...we have to make mistakes and learn how to avoid that in the future, and if we dont avoid it again, we have another screw up to remind us, and we're just gonna do it over and over again till we get it right, which can ultimately hurt you if u dont do it right the first time... sometimes life lessons are so hard and they hurt so much...it ultimately comes down to self control i think...possibly that you lack some...thats just my opinion if you want it..just that we wanna be nice sometimes but we dont have enough self control not to argue back...and we're such hpocritical beings, have you ever noticed that? i think its so much easier to see the flaws in other people than ourselfs because we're so stuck on us...and doesnt that thought just make you sick? that we're so high and mighty on ourselves that we cant see the problems that we have? and we dont have enough self control to change the flaws that we do see? we're just incredibly sick creatures..i mean which brings me to the point of why on earth would God have chosen US to do his work? it baffles my mind to wonder why in the world he would put me here and what kind of purpose he could have for someone liek me whos totally spoiled and has no self control to change herself for the better, what use could i possibly be to him?...chew on that thought for a while..
